channel.title: os on Meow
channel.description: Recent content in os on Meow

item.title: rCore
item.description: Useful Command To show platforms based on riscv that rustc supports 1 rustc --print target-list | grep riscv Rust Note use #![no_std] to not use std, so we can build a program which doesn't require std. use #![no_main] to make compiler don't do initialization work Toolings strace cargo-binutils
